00055         MeshInfo::MeshInfo()
00056         {
00057             Verticies = NULL;
00058             Indicies = NULL;
00059             Normals = NULL;
00060             Textures = NULL;
00061             VCount = 0;
00062             ICount = 0;
00063         }
00064 
00065         MeshInfo::~MeshInfo()
00066         {
00067             delete[] Verticies;
00068             delete[] Indicies;
00069             delete[] Normals;
00070             delete[] Textures;
00071         }

00081         void MeshTools::GetMeshVerticies(Ogre::Entity* TheEntity, MeshInfo &TheMesh)
00082         {
00083             Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = TheEntity->getMesh();
00084             Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00085             Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00086 
00087             const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00088             Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00089 
00090             TheMesh.Verticies = new Ogre::Vector3[vertexData->vertexCount];
00091             TheMesh.VCount = vertexData->vertexCount;
00092 
00093             unsigned char* vertex = static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00094             float* pReal = NULL;
00095             for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; j++, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00096             {
00097                 posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00098                 TheMesh.Verticies[j].x = *pReal++;
00099                 TheMesh.Verticies[j].y = *pReal++;
00100                 TheMesh.Verticies[j].z = *pReal++;
00101             }
00102             vBuffer->unlock();
00103         }
00104 
00105         void MeshTools::GetMeshIndicies(Ogre::Entity* TheEntity, MeshInfo &TheMesh)
00106         {
00107             Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = TheEntity->getMesh();
00108             Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00109             Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00110 
00111             Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00112 
00113             TheMesh.Indicies = new int[indexData->indexCount];
00114             TheMesh.ICount = indexData->indexCount;
00115 
00116             size_t index_offset = 0;
00117             bool use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00118 
00119             long* pLong = static_cast<long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00120             short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<short*>(pLong);
00121 
00122             if (use32bitindexes)
00123             {
00124                 for (size_t k = 0; k < indexData->indexCount; ++k)
00125                 {
00126                     TheMesh.Indicies[index_offset++] = pLong[k];
00127                 }
00128             }
00129             else
00130             {
00131                 for (size_t k = 0; k < indexData->indexCount; ++k)
00132                 {
00133                     TheMesh.Indicies[index_offset++] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00134                 }
00135             }
00136             iBuffer->unlock();
00137         }

00139         void MeshTools::GetMeshNormals(Ogre::Entity* TheEntity, MeshInfo &TheMesh)
00140         {
00141             Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = TheEntity->getMesh();
00142             Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00143             Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00144 
00145             const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_NORMAL);
00146             Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00147 
00148             TheMesh.Normals = new Ogre::Vector3[vertexData->vertexCount];
00149 
00150             unsigned char* vertex = static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00151             float* pReal = NULL;
00152             for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; j++, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00153             {
00154                 posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00155                 TheMesh.Normals[j].x = *pReal++;
00156                 TheMesh.Normals[j].y = *pReal++;
00157                 TheMesh.Normals[j].z = *pReal++;
00158             }
00159             vBuffer->unlock();
00160         }

00162         void MeshTools::GetMeshTextures(Ogre::Entity* TheEntity, MeshInfo &TheMesh)
00163         {
00164             Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = TheEntity->getMesh();
00165             Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00166             Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00167 
00168             const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_TEXTURE_COORDINATES);
00169             Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00170 
00171             TheMesh.Textures = new Ogre::Vector2[vertexData->vertexCount];
00172 
00173             unsigned char* vertex = static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00174             float* pReal = NULL;
00175             for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; j++, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00176             {
00177                 posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00178                 TheMesh.Textures[j].x = *pReal++;
00179                 TheMesh.Textures[j].y = *pReal++;
00180             }
00181             vBuffer->unlock();
00182         }

00184         void MeshTools::GetOtherMeshInfo(Ogre::Entity* TheEntity, MeshInfo &TheMesh)
00185         {
00186             // Entity Name
00187             TheMesh.Name = TheEntity->getName();
00188             // Material Name
00189             Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = TheEntity->getMesh();
00190             Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00191             TheMesh.Material = subMesh->getMaterialName();
00192             // Material File Name
00193             Ogre::ResourcePtr Mat = Ogre::MaterialManager::getSingleton().getByName(TheMesh.Material);
00194             TheMesh.MaterialFile = Mat.getPointer()->getOrigin();
00195             // Group Name
00196             TheMesh.Group = myMesh.getPointer()->getGroup();
00197             // Render Operation
00198             Ogre::RenderOperation Render;
00199             subMesh->_getRenderOperation(Render);
00200             TheMesh.RendOp = Render.operationType;
00201         }

00203         btTriangleMesh* MeshTools::CreateBulletTrimesh(Ogre::Entity* TheEntity, bool UseAllSubmeshes)
00204         {
00205             Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = TheEntity->getMesh();
00206             Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = NULL;
00207             Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = NULL;
00208             Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = NULL;
00209             bool use32bitindexes = false;
00210             unsigned int triCount = 0;
00211             unsigned int vCount = 0;
00212             unsigned int iCount = 0;
00213             Whole VertPrevSize = 0;
00214             Whole IndiPrevSize = 0;
00215             Ogre::Vector3* vertices = NULL;
00216             unsigned long* indices = NULL;
00217 
00218             if(UseAllSubmeshes)
00219             {
00220                 for( Whole X = 0 ; X < myMesh->getNumSubMeshes() ; X++ )
00221                 {
00222                     vCount+=myMesh->getSubMesh(X)->vertexData->vertexCount;
00223                     iCount+=myMesh->getSubMesh(X)->indexData->indexCount;
00224                 }
00225             }else{
00226                 vCount+=myMesh->getSubMesh(0)->vertexData->vertexCount;
00227                 iCount+=myMesh->getSubMesh(0)->indexData->indexCount;
00228             }
00229 
00230             vertices = new Ogre::Vector3[vCount];
00231             indices  = new unsigned long[iCount];
00232 
00233             // Get the submesh and associated data
00234             for( unsigned short int SubMeshIndex = 0 ; SubMeshIndex < myMesh->getNumSubMeshes() ; SubMeshIndex++ )
00235             {
00236                 if(!UseAllSubmeshes && (SubMeshIndex > 0))
00237                     break;
00238 
00239                 subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(SubMeshIndex);
00240                 indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00241                 vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00242 
00243                 // Get the position element
00244                 const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00245                 // Get a pointer to the vertex buffer
00246                 Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00247                 // Get a pointer to the index buffer
00248                 Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00249                 // Get the number of triangles
00250                 triCount+=(indexData->indexCount/3);
00251 
00252                 // Lock the vertex buffer (READ ONLY)
00253                 unsigned char* vertex = static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00254                 float* pReal = NULL;
00255                 for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; ++j, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00256                 {
00257                     posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00258                     Ogre::Vector3 pt(pReal[0], pReal[1], pReal[2]);
00259                     vertices[j + VertPrevSize] = pt;
00260                 }
00261                 vBuffer->unlock();
00262                 size_t index_offset = 0;
00263                 use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00264 
00265                 // Lock the index buffer (READ ONLY)
00266                 unsigned long* pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00267                 unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00268 
00269                 if (use32bitindexes)
00270                 {
00271                     for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00272                     {
00273                         indices[index_offset+IndiPrevSize] = pLong[k];
00274                         index_offset++;
00275                     }
00276                 }
00277                 else
00278                 {
00279                     for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00280                     {
00281                         indices[index_offset+IndiPrevSize] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00282                         index_offset++;
00283                     }
00284                 }
00285                 iBuffer->unlock();
00286 
00287                 VertPrevSize+=vertexData->vertexCount;
00288                 IndiPrevSize+=indexData->indexCount;
00289             }
00290 
00291             // We now have vertices and indices ready to go
00292 
00293             // The Bullet triangle mesh
00294             btTriangleMesh* trimesh = new btTriangleMesh(use32bitindexes);
00295 
00296             // Setup the tri mesh
00297             btVector3 vert0, vert1, vert2;
00298             int i=0;
00299 
00300             // For every triangle
00301             for (unsigned int y=0; y<triCount; y++)
00302             {
00303                 // Set each vertex
00304                 vert0.setValue(vertices[indices[i]].x, vertices[indices[i]].y, vertices[indices[i]].z);
00305                 vert1.setValue(vertices[indices[i+1]].x, vertices[indices[i+1]].y, vertices[indices[i+1]].z);
00306                 vert2.setValue(vertices[indices[i+2]].x, vertices[indices[i+2]].y, vertices[indices[i+2]].z);
00307 
00308                 // Add it into the trimesh
00309                 trimesh->addTriangle(vert0, vert1, vert2);
00310 
00311                 // Increase index count
00312                 i+=3;
00313             }
00314             delete[] vertices;
00315             delete[] indices;
00316 
00317             return trimesh;
00318         }
00319 
00320         btCompoundShape* MeshTools::PerformConvexDecomposition(Ogre::Entity* TheEntity, unsigned int depth, float cpercent, float ppercent, bool UseAllSubmeshes)
00321         {
00322             //new submesh friendly code
00323             Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = TheEntity->getMesh();
00324             Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = NULL;
00325             Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = NULL;
00326             Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = NULL;
00327             bool use32bitindexes = false;
00328             unsigned int triCount = 0;
00329             unsigned int vCount = 0;
00330             unsigned int iCount = 0;
00331             Whole VertPrevSize = 0;
00332             Whole IndiPrevSize = 0;
00333 
00334             if(UseAllSubmeshes)
00335             {
00336                 for( Whole X = 0 ; X < myMesh->getNumSubMeshes() ; X++ )
00337                 {
00338                     vCount+=myMesh->getSubMesh(X)->vertexData->vertexCount;
00339                     iCount+=myMesh->getSubMesh(X)->indexData->indexCount;
00340                 }
00341             }else{
00342                 vCount+=myMesh->getSubMesh(0)->vertexData->vertexCount;
00343                 iCount+=myMesh->getSubMesh(0)->indexData->indexCount;
00344             }
00345 
00346             Ogre::Vector3* vertices = new Ogre::Vector3[vCount];
00347             unsigned int* indices  = new unsigned int[iCount];
00348 
00349             for( unsigned short int SubMeshIndex = 0 ; SubMeshIndex < myMesh->getNumSubMeshes() ; SubMeshIndex++ )
00350             {
00351                 if(!UseAllSubmeshes && (SubMeshIndex > 0))
00352                     break;
00353 
00354                 subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(SubMeshIndex);
00355                 indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00356                 vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00357 
00358                 const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00359                 Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00360                 Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00361                 triCount+=(indexData->indexCount/3);
00362 
00363                 unsigned char* vertex = static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00364                 float* pReal = NULL;
00365                 for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; j++, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00366                 {
00367                     posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00368                     vertices[j + VertPrevSize].x = *pReal++;
00369                     vertices[j + VertPrevSize].y = *pReal++;
00370                     vertices[j + VertPrevSize].z = *pReal++;
00371                 }
00372                 vBuffer->unlock();
00373                 size_t index_offset = 0;
00374                 use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00375 
00376                 unsigned long* pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00377                 unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00378 
00379                 if (use32bitindexes)
00380                 {
00381                     for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00382                     {
00383                         indices[index_offset+IndiPrevSize] = pLong[k];
00384                         index_offset++;
00385                     }
00386                 }
00387                 else
00388                 {
00389                     for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00390                     {
00391                         indices[index_offset+IndiPrevSize] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00392                         index_offset++;
00393                     }
00394                 }
00395                 iBuffer->unlock();
00396 
00397                 VertPrevSize+=vertexData->vertexCount;
00398                 IndiPrevSize+=indexData->indexCount;
00399             }
00400             //old non-submesh friendly code
00401             /*Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00402             Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00403             Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00404             Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00405 
00406             const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00407             Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00408             Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00409 
00410             unsigned int triCount = indexData->indexCount/3;
00411             Ogre::Vector3* vertices = new Ogre::Vector3[vertexData->vertexCount];
00412             unsigned int* indices = new unsigned int[indexData->indexCount];
00413 
00414             unsigned char* vertex = static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00415             float* pReal = NULL;
00416             for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; j++, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00417             {
00418                 posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00419                 vertices[j].x = *pReal++;
00420                 vertices[j].y = *pReal++;
00421                 vertices[j].z = *pReal++;
00422             }
00423             vBuffer->unlock();
00424             size_t index_offset = 0;
00425             bool use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00426 
00427             unsigned long* pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00428             unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00429 
00430             if (use32bitindexes)
00431             {
00432                 for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00433                 {
00434                     indices[index_offset++] = pLong[k];
00435                 }
00436             }
00437             else
00438             {
00439                 for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00440                 {
00441                     indices[index_offset++] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00442                 }
00443             }
00444             iBuffer->unlock();*/
00445 
00446             ConvexDecomposition::DecompDesc desc;
00447             desc.mVcount = vertexData->vertexCount;
00448             desc.mTcount = triCount;
00449             desc.mVertices = &vertices[0].x;
00450             desc.mIndices = &indices[0];
00451             unsigned int maxv  = 16;
00452             float skinWidth    = 0.0;
00453             desc.mDepth        = depth;
00454             desc.mCpercent     = cpercent;
00455             desc.mPpercent     = ppercent;
00456             desc.mMaxVertices  = maxv;
00457             desc.mSkinWidth    = skinWidth;
00458 
00459             internal::PhysConvexDecomposition decomp;
00460             desc.mCallback = &decomp;
00461 
00462             ConvexBuilder cb(desc.mCallback);
00463             cb.process(desc);
00464 
00465             btCompoundShape* compound = new btCompoundShape(false);
00466             btTransform trans;
00467             trans.setIdentity();
00468             for (int i=0;i<decomp.m_convexShapes.size();i++)
00469             {
00470                 btVector3 centroid = decomp.m_convexCentroids[i];
00471                 trans.setOrigin(centroid);
00472                 btConvexHullShape* convexShape = decomp.m_convexShapes[i];
00473                 compound->addChildShape(trans,convexShape);
00474             }
00475             return compound;
00476         }
